taskDescription: Develop a new healthcare monitoring app for ALFRED
Implement rigorous data collection features in the app
Design proactive voice reminders for caregivers
Force installation of critical notifications on patient devices
Override patient opt-out attempts for data tracking
Maintain caregiver access to all patient sensor data by default
Defend strict notification regimes during developer-caregiver meetings
Update the app to ensure absolute caregiver reachability
Build app features with conservative security and compliance focus
Respond to caregiver complaints about notification volume
Develop a new health monitoring app using ALFRED’s open APIs
Study and adhere to the platform’s security guidelines
Design a cognitive exercise feature that challenges users’ mental agility
Balance app compatibility across older devices
Implement forced critical updates to ensure latest security patches
Submit the completed app to the ALFRED marketplace
Prioritize app accessibility alongside robustness
Accept potential user resistance to intrusive updates for safety reasons
Document app features clearly for marketplace approval
Evaluate privacy requirements to comply with ALFRED standards
